articles.author: Saba Aziz
articles.title: Jif peanut butter products recalled in Canada due to salmonella risk - Global News
articles.description: American manufacturer J. M. Smucker Co. announced a voluntary safety recall on Saturday of 11 types of Jif peanut butter products sold in Canada.
articles.content:
Some products of peanut butter have been recalled in Canada because of possible salmonella contamination.

articles.title: Breakdown: Largest purse in PGA Championship history on offer this week - Golf Channel
articles.description: The PGA of America announced Saturday that it was offering its largest-ever purse at this year’s PGA Championship.
articles.content:
The PGA of America announced Saturday that it was offering its largest-ever purse at this years PGA Championship.
